citeinfo.origin: Research Data Services (RDS), Columbia University Libraries
citeinfo.title: Carte du Bengale et de ses Dependances, 1775

descript.abstract: This is a scanned version of the 1775 paper map entitled: Carte du Bengale et de ses dependances. The map was scanned at 300 dots per inch and is in the TIFF format. Thanks to Prof. Frances Pritchett, Columbia University, for providing the original paper map for this scan.
descript.purpose: Scanned maps may be used for a variety of purposes. This image may be used in a GIS; the dataset includes a .txt file containing a table of coordinates that may be used to aid in georeferencing the image; to use the coordinate table make sure that the data frame is in the WGS 1984 projection, then open the link table from the georeferencing toolbar, then select the load button, then navigate to the accompanying LINKTABLE.txt file.

cntorgp.cntorg: Research Data Services (RDS), Columbia University Libraries

idinfo.datacred: Thanks to Prof. Frances Pritchett, Columbia University, for providing the original paper map for this scan.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3500

dataqual.logic: The raster image is a faithfully reproduced digital image of the original source map. Some differences may be detected between the source graphic used and the raster image due to the RGB values assigned that particular color. The intent is to recreate those colors as near as possible.
dataqual.complete: Data completeness for digitized paper map files reflect the content of the source graphic.
